name: Reasonable Claustrophobia
description:
The alien Kas of planet Perzak have built themselves a claustrophobic base! Kill them and their leader before they keep building these counter-intuitive monoliths!

A game for Ludum Dare 42

Art, code, and level design by @RetrosaurDev

Music and additional level design by @Riapos

(Fonts courtesy of @somepx)

(Go check them out!)
